value:
People from Hoshido might mistake
me for a mage from Nohr. What do
you think, $Nu?

Wearing a costume is an interesting
experience. You get to become an
entirely different person for a while.

I like the idea of Nohr and Hoshido
celebrating one another's fashions.
It helps us understand each other.

I've got a whole bag full of sweets.
Would you like one? OK, open wide—
here comes the candy broom!

See these bats? I trapped them in
webs. That's what happens when
you try to trick me!

We're celebrating the harvest festival!
Want to join? Get your costume and
come to $Nf's!

Are you enjoying this harvest festival
as much as I am?

I won't stand for anyone trying to
get treats without tricks!

Oh no, I'm all out of sweets. Don't
worry, though—I'll restock later for
you, I promise!

Oh, thanks! What a great gift to
celebrate the festival.

I'm Corrin, and I've brought plenty of
sweets for all these festivalgoers!

Hey, good to see you! Are you
enjoying the evening's festivities,
$Nu? Good.$k$pMy siblings have all been very curious
about my costume. They all thought
I was supposed to be a Dark Mage!$k$pNot exactly what I was going for, but
it makes sense. The look does have
a Nohrian feel to it.$k$pIt's interesting how people are drawn
to the familiar, even when they're in
another world, don't you think?$k$pIt makes me wonder if some human
tendencies are just inescapable.
Like conflict, for example.$k$pAh, sorry. I don't mean to bring down
the mood. Let's focus on what
matters: enjoying the harvest festival!
Trick or treat!
How's this?
Did I scare you?
You do have candy, right?
One trick too many...
Is this how wizards really dress? I love the hat!
Whoa! You're good at playing tricks too, huh?
There's so much variety in these costumes. Wait... What's that one supposed to be?
Look at all the masks on display. That pumpkin one's great! I considered it myself.
Ooh, sorry, I'm fresh out of treats. All my brothers and sisters…
If I were a real wizard, do you think I could find a way for all of my siblings to be together?
I cannot wait to see your costume. Hang on… You're not planning on wearing one?
Good plan.
What shall I do?
What a festival!
